content.detailedDescription:
Out on clear night watching sky. some stars seemed to black out, then come back on. looked at area with "west marine, raiatea, 7x50, field 6.6 degrees, 350ft/1000yds binoculars" and undulating, pulsating, multiple light object came into very clear view. looked so close i put binoculars down to view w/ just eyesight and it was gone. put binoculars back up and it was back. only visible through binocular lens materials. (was watching ufo hunters, aliens at the airport, 2009 episode" and saw the jal 1521 orb "only visible through camera lenses and thought i'd confirm that.

ps i already mentioned this to mufon's bob upson (west palm beach, fl.) when he interviewed me about the (gray) alien hand print pictures that were on my left arm. i sent you guys one of the two pics i still have. pictures pretty scary, huh!?!
content.summary: Invisble to eyesight; visible only through binocular lenses

content.detailedDescription:
Me and friend was riding down david's road at night i'm into storms but this day what i thought was a storm approaching wasn't i was riding passenger in my friends cavalier when out the over cast sky flash a color like lighting sky blue i ask my friend did he hear anything about a storm he replied no as i stared out the window it flash again because i love to watch them but he replied no again... so i watch and then it shined navy blue but there was no streaks of lightning just a flash so i called his name look look,whats up with the sky? he either pulled over or something it seem as if things slow down a bit and then he seen the navy blue flash it was over the car area in the corn fields it was a sunday i remember because i bought liquor from the bootleg and the day before we had a freak storm that made me hide all my pets in the basement and like i said i love storms but that saturday i was freak out... 
so back to the story while we were on [location removed] we seen another color which was green then purple orange yellow and this illuminated the whole sky what ever color i name the whole sky was that color it  flash pinkish it was like a diamond when light hits in the day it twinkle the night sky last of all it shine red but this color didn't flash it glow strong a deep dark red and orange over the trees it look as if the forest was on fire because it landed in the trees which was in the back where it landed you and see the red lights on the ship glow and pulsating like i said it was april 15 2005 and it landed maybe a football field and a half after it flew over us in the corn fields and corn maybe was no more then knee or ankle high so i can see pretty far where it was after the red glow it shine all the colors i mention again but this time it was only for 7 seconds and it shine all the colors again repeated for 7 seconds then all the lights shut off as i turn my face to the driver we were silence for 2 seconds then i replied what do you think that was he said what do you think it was knowing what it was i just wanted to make sure we was on the same page so i replied what do you think it was again he said the same reply i said that was a ufo he stated yeah it was i had money in my pocket and asked him if i can give him 80 dollars to take me to it but he replied i have to get back home to my wife...Now this guy at the time wasn't working and 80 dollars is a lot just to take me to it his height was at least 6'3 250 bls but the look on his face was very shook and scared i plea'd please take me and bribe him but he wasn't going so as we drove to my house i never took my eyes where i seen it landed because i never seen it take off and go back up as i got home i decided to walk to the area where i notice up the street that the police had there lights on because a car drove threw and gas station window i went in the store the cop as me whats up i said its a lot of weird stuff going on he replied yeah a lot with a strange look on his face it shook me as if he could read my mind on what i saw i change my mind walking to the location where i saw the sighting and never went later that night i was over whelm with fear and strange emotions, crying, nervous,fear i was more lost with more question then i ever had 7 days of mental ups and down my friend had them to according to his wife if i can share this story in person or on t.V the only way i would is by taking a lie detector test to clear me from and false lies men might share for personal gain......Im my answers came to me after i was lock up and had time for spiritual help by god it became more cleat like ezekiel vision......Thks for your time and god speed........Many are called few are chosen
content.summary: Life changing scary at first for several days.........

content.detailedDescription:
I noticed the object when i came out my back door of my home to close my garage door. the back of my house faces east and i noticed a red object in the northeast night sky. at first glance it appeared to be an ascending object, like a firework shell perhaps, though not very bright. but as i watched it, i could see it had a straight and level flight path heading southwest.

so i ran in the house and got my camera. i estimate i started shooting video about 30 seconds after i first spotted the object. between trying to watch the object and shooting video, the object goes out of frame several times. the video also looks a little different from what i saw. the changes in color and luminosity appear more dramatic in the video than what my eyes saw. as the object moved overhead, it looked circular in shape and appeared to have a concentric circle in the middle that was slightly brighter. it's luminosity remained somewhat constant until it began to fade, from what i remember.

the object moved overhead, but was a bit to the west of my location, on the south west heading. then i noticed the object beginning to dim, as if the light was slowly being turned off. i had to walk to the west down my driveway in order to visually track it, and it continued to fade out until it's luminosity was zero . i almost get a sense that it was transparent because of the muted red color it gave off and the way it appeared to just fade out. 

i tried to continue to track it's path, but i couldn't. the trees across the street were blocking my view of it's heading shortly after it faded out. 

the flight path was straight and level the whole time and i didn't hear any sound coming from the object. the sky was clear that night in the area of my observation and my surroundings were audibly quiet as well. my camera is a canon sd750 point and shoot type. it recorded the event at 9:52 pm, but after checking its internal clock later, i found it to be slow by 58 minutes, probably due to daylight savings time. i estimate the sighting duration to be about one and a half minutes.
content.summary: Fluttering / pulsing red circle traveling sw in night sky above manitowoc

content.detailedDescription: I was a soldier in afghanistan, and during my shifts on the base and very often out in the mountains during a snow storm these lights would appear and it was like they were scanning the mountains and would move faster than any object mankind has to the next mountain and do the same.  could only be seen through infrared.  i called up on a recorded satellite radio to ask if we were being resupplied and they said no everything was grounded due to whether.  then within 4 miles 5 lights only seen through infrared appeared on the ground in perfect spacing and was moving like a convoy. just when i thought it was friendly's i called and asked if we had ground supply and they said all units have stopped operating due to weather, then the lights moved in reverse and dissappeared.  i watched a documentary and some of the things were simular to what i saw.  i have always told people about it, but they think i'm just being silly.  i'm telling you, no country has an something that can move so smooth nearly riding up and down mountains and moving to the next one like that.
content.summary: Infrared lights, only seen through nvg's

content.detailedDescription: We drove off nd highway 1804 going south on a trail. upon reaching the edge of the breaks the radio said that a ufo has been sighted in the river bottoms south of menoken nd. within a few seconds we observed a flying disk hovering about a quarter mile east of our position. we continued down the hill and when we got to the bottom the craft quickly came to a position directly over the car at an elevation of 50ft.  we were terrified so i grabbed the rifle i had with me and sat on the rear window sill , put my elbows on the roof of the car, and toot aim at the craft. i called to the driver to keep the car moving and he stepped on the gas pedal and almost threw me off the car. i told him to just keep moving but not so fast. the craft was glowing from the time we first sighted it and now was lighting the area all around us. my fear was forcing me to make the decision to shoot at the object. i started to put pressure on the trigger when an image of the car we were in was implanted on my visual field  twisted smoking and burning along the trail ahead of us. this made me reconsider pulling the trigger and i released the pressure on it.  after lowering the rifle the craft gained elevation to about 100ft and headed southeast and  we lost sight of it as it went behind the trees.
content.summary: Car radio report ufo sighted south of menoken in the river bottoms. within 10 sec a flying disk was observed hovering about a quarter mile  east of us just below the missouri breaks. we drove down a path into the river bottoms when we saw the object

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I came home from work,was relaxing, there was to be a meteor shower late so i stayed up to watch. sitting on my balcony i noticed a light from a good distance away moving very stealth like. mind you last night/this morning was very clear out no clouds. the light looked like a descent sized star. moving quickly and smooth. this was 1:30 approx 2 am. it would move then stop then to the left a bit then straight. i thought it was a drone the movement. in comparison. it seemed to get closer this went on for over an hour. i also did see a few meteors they looked closer. then the object ascended up very quickly were the light was still very bright to see. but far. and it stopped and slowly moved over. now this is why i'm writing this. there was a blueish circular tube that appeared like a cloud the middle was black. the object went into the middle. and then turned to two, or broke off  the one light went through and disappeared  leaving another light which went the opposite direction and then straight up until i could no longer see it. i tried to take photo. but did turn out. has to be explanation. this is the most remarkable thing i've ever witnessed. i looked online to see if anyone else saw what i did. i'm not a crazy person. but i really do think i saw something extraordinary.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Thought it was a drone/s..

content.detailedDescription:
Before i start the actual story, i’ll just say that at my primary school (i live in the uk), there were two playgrounds to go to at break/lunch for those in years 3-6 (grade 2-5 i think?). anyway, one was called “bottom playground”, and the other, which was up a quite short but rather steep slope from it, was called “top playground”. (not very inventive, i know.)

so, i was 9 years old, so in year 4 or 5, and i was waiting to go inside to eat my lunch (the year groups are on a rota). i was just standing on “bottom playground”, as my friend was ill that day so i had no-one to talk to/play with.

i was looking up at “top playground” and watching a frisbee flying across it. i was waiting to see someone catch it, but no-one did. the disc just carried on going, not losing any height at all. that’s when i realised it wasn’t a frisbee at all. it was much bigger and further away, although how big and how far away i can’t tell you, but it was at least a mile, i’m sure of that. the disc was a silver-black colour, looking like your average hollywood movie ufo.

after watching it rather lazily fly across the sky for a while, i noticed a second disc, pretty much identical, slightly higher up and further behind the first one. i remember wishing i had a camera on me, but, you know, i was 9 and in the middle of a school day. and i’d wanted to show someone else, but i was too shy to go up to someone and point out something i didn’t even know if they could see. no-one else seemed to have noticed them, so i was sceptical of whether they were even visible to them. probably, but they were all too busy playing.

we got called inside to eat lunch, so i turned away, but when i looked back to where they had been a few seconds later, they were gone.

while typing this up, i’d began to wonder if any of this actually happened, or if i was making it all up. i often wonder about that. but then i remembered that that day, when i’d got home from school, i’d told my mum about it, and she put it on a ufo forum, to see if anyone else had seen the discs.

here is the post she made (some details are different here, this is due to her misinterpreting what i’d told her when i was 9.):

location of sighting: prestwich, manchester
date of sighting: friday 18th september 2009
time: about 1pm
witness name: anon (a minor aged 9 ½ yrs)

witness statement: my daughter told me on friday that at lunchtime when lining up to go back into school after dinner she saw two frizby shapes in the sky, looking from park view school top playground towards bury new road direction. they were blackish-silver and diagonal to each other. the higher of the two then seemed to disappear. she looked away and when she looked back she could not see either of them any more. very strange!

[originally posted to uk-ufo.Co.Uk]
content.summary: Two disc shapes flying at different heights seen for short amount of time before disappearing

content.detailedDescription: It was a quiet night in august 11th 2015. my friend "l" and i decided to take a country cruise since the stars were out with no clouds. we started the cruise at 9:35pm. everything was uneventful for the first ten minutes. then "l" stopped the car and said "dude! look at that what the f**k!?" i looked up in time to see 2 glowing yellow orange shapes in the sky then the orange glow would disappear and they would begin to imitate airplanes. we followed in pursuit of the two objects. for about 7 minutes we followed them while they blinked a very small white light. i must add there were airplanes in the sky at the same time and they would blink completely differently. the ufo's seemed to do a long blink followed by a type of strobe light blink that would go out and repeat on cue. just about 7 minutes after they lit up like fire in the sky for the first time it happens again... except this time we noticed a split and 2 ufo's turned to three and then the other one did the same and 3 turned to four. compelety amazed by what we saw we had not thought about taking a picture or video yet. so i had "l" stop the car by an open field so i could get some shots from my iphone. as soon as i pulled my phone out the lights started flowing on one again. this glow lasted longer then the others. before it would only glow yellow red for 5 seconds but this time it held for about 15-20 seconds and i was able to take pictures and even have pictures showing it split into 2 making a total of 5 crafts in the sky. no sounds were observed and the lights soon all disappeared after i took the photo evidence. we drove home to examine the pictures and what we found can not be explained. all photos were taken while car sat motionless. please contact me for more photos i was able to take 13 photos and 1 video
content.summary: Lights in the sky would glow bright orange and then multiply. then would fade to small orbs and fly in formatio.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in the florida room, sitting by the large picture window.  it was around 7pm.  the sky was clear and blue.  i noticed military jet passing by and a passenger jet also.  then i noticed a 'dot' in the sky.  i asked my wife if she could see it.. she said yes.  i got my 10x zoom camera and took 2 pictures of it through a double pain window.  then i got my binoculars and was totally amazed at what i saw.  it was round or oval.. had what looked like balloons or bubbles all around it that were rotating clockwise, changing colors with what looked like some sort of electrical field or force field around the object.  this field would vary according to the bubble rotation and color.  it finally went out of view to the south east.  we've lived in this house for a short time and we are constantly seeing different ufo anomalies.
content.summary: Moving slowly, observed through binoculars, had some kind of force field around it

content.detailedDescription: I witnessed this while on my way home with my dad, we were just leaving my unlce's house in triple crown. it was a school night so i had to get home. i was looking out the window and i saw three very large lights hovering over a house not to far from my own. i told my dad we stopped the car. the lights were moving but were still keeping their triangular shape. we were not their very long, we were on frog town road which is a mainroad. but that night there were not many cars. there was one car though coming up behind us so we had to keep driving. once we got home we looked outside, we were not that far from the house the lights were hovering above, sadly the lights were gone by now but i'll never forget that night. i dont remember the day it was on but i do remember it was late at night on a school night around eleven or twelve it was very calm.
content.summary: Triangular shape, large, bright lights and flat looking

content.detailedDescription:
My partner and i were driving on the highway back from a trip to switzerland; it was about 02:00 am when we arrived at about 200 meters from the toll gate porte-lès-valence direction south, i noticed 5 large yellow orange lights pulsing a few meters above the toll gate. as we approached i saw that these lights where positioned on a dark cigar like craft. then after a few seconds, the craft gained altitude and disappeared into the clouds. i reported what i saw to my girlfriend sitting on the passenger seat, but she didn’t have enough time to see it before it disappeared. at this time the highway was empty and i didn’t notice any other car around. 

the photoshoped illustrations provided are describing the ufo main apparence and ist position on the exact location taken from a street view screenshot (the pulsatng lights could not be reproduced on the illustration).  

• text for image 1 : yellow orange pulsing lights, not simultanious and without order

• text for image 2 : the object dissapeared behind the clouds (slowly flying up aprox 10 to 20 meters, the clouds are at very low altitude)
content.summary: Big cigar shaped object with 5 pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: Ok, it was clear summer night on june 18th i was having a bonfire with friends. i have 3 other eyewitness that saw what i saw and will back me up. my friends saw a grayish aspirin like circle in the sky with one light on it facing right of the circle. it was so high up and moving very fast. too fast to be a satellite. too close for a satellite. it was coming from the southeast and heading southwest.
content.summary: Its hard to descride on this. i need to talk tbut all i can say it that i know what a airplane looks like and a helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: aug 12,2015 me ad my brother went outside to smoke a cigarette and we noticed 3 pulsating lights in a straight vertical line, they appeared to be changing colors and or pulsating.There were 5 other objects omitting orange and red lights while the other three appeared to be blue and green we continued to sit on the back porch for 2 hours watching them until we went inside.We live next to a hospital with helicopter landing pad and an airport is just 20 minutes away, but my brother is an u.S. air force veteran and spent 6 years just working on jets so he knows a jet or plane in the air when he sees one even a helicopter. we originally thought it was a constellation so we pulled out google sky map on my phone and it showed nothing there but open space.There are a few commercial aircraft in the area flying around but nothing as high in the sky as these lights n they have not moved or hours, im currently sitting at the attic window watching them as i type this
content.summary: Observed 3 bright lights in a straight verticle line with 5 ther objects hovering around

content.detailedDescription: I drove to otautu bay, 10mins from colville, new zealand at 2am.  sat on the bonnet of my car which was parked 10 feet from the small bridge at the end of the bay, i noticed a ufo hovering above some trees across the bay.  the ufo was moving very fast in all directions flashing different colored lights. the ufo moved up and down, then left to right, moving very fast.  it was hovering over a particular are of the forest for over an hour.  i had not been drinking alcohol or intoxicated in any way.
content.summary: Sitting on beach looking across the bay i saw flashing lights of different colors on a ufo that moved very fast in all directions displaying lots of colors.

content.detailedDescription: On 8-12-15, at approximately 12:30 am, i had went outside to see if i could see any meteors from the shower that's supposed to be happening. i started in my front yard, looking west. i noticed a bright orange "sparkling" or flashing object in the sky, just above the tree line. i dismissed it as a planet. i sat in my chair for about 5 minutes, while my fiancée went to the back yard. he called me to the back, and pointed it out. i said it was probably a planet. we both went to the front yard and we're looking into the sky. after a few minutes, he decided to go back and look at the "planet". it had completely disappeared out of the western sky. we then discovered it had moved to the northeastern sky area, just above the tree line, it was low and flashing orange, red, blue, and green with a white stationary light in the background, possible on the craft. we watched it for quite a while. as i'm making this report, it is 2:16 am on 8-12-15. it was ascending, while very slowly moving to the east. we sat stationary in a chair to make sure we weren't moving and watched the object finally move behind a tree. at that time, we walked down the sidewalk, about 5 feet, and could see it again. it seems the make jerky motions, almost like 2 steps forward, one step back. as we were losing sight behind the tree, we noticed a second object same in color and lighting, possible smaller, or just appeared that way due to distance. it was ascending to the first object we seen, at a much faster pace. we both are very curious as to what it is. we decided to come inside and it could still be seen ascending into the east while the second object seemed to be trying to catch up to the first one.
content.summary: Unidentified object in northeast lincoln nebraska 8-12-2015 1am

content.detailedDescription: Traveling west on hw-26 and was a few miles outside washtucna, wa. there is some rocky, rolling terrain that can block your view down the valley but as i turned a corner there was a large white craft that came into view. it was maybe 1500' off the deck and traveling at a constant speed, approximately 200kts headed east and was 1-2 miles from the highway. the light color was brilliant white-blue that almost hurt to look at because it was late at night. it lit up the entire valley the highway parallels. i of course hit the brakes so could get a better look and in 30 seconds it was gone from view.  it was intially very startling to see something that large and bright as i have plenty of experience flying small airplanes so i knew instantly this was not a blimp or something. i had no sense to grab my phone for a picture, but i doubt it would have been a good shot anyways plus i was driving a box van so i wanted to stay on the road. the craft was almost perfectly eppisoidal and looked greater than 400' long and maybe 75-100' tall. definitely the biggest thing i have ever seen close up  and probably a once in a lifetime sighting.  the craft kind of reminded me of the larger ships charles hall describes in his books millenial hospitality, plus it was a warm summer night as i was driving thru some of that scab land. fits the profile, but who knows. it was a overall shockingly awesome experience but i didn't notice any lost time or anything out of the ordinary after the sighting.  though i was very glad my dog was with me for company after that, ha.
content.summary: Brilliant white 400' or greater eppisoidal craft  traveling sw to e up a valley ridgeline

content.detailedDescription: It was between 830 and 9 o'clock in the evening night on 6 august 2015.  i was driving north on highway 54 near mile marker 98 in southern new mexico near the town of tularosa nm when i looked up at about 45 to 60° in the northwest sky.   i saw what appeared to be a reddish orange light in color turn off and then another light the same size turned on in a sequence.  this happened three more times.   i asked my wife to look at the sky and she caught the last light as it was going out.   a few moments later the lights reappeared in the same direction in the sky at the same angle as the last time the lights came on and off.  this time we saw the lights turn off and on seven times before they went behind clouds that were high in altitude.   the lights that were red/orange in color had to be large because the lights were bigger than what one would see when looking at an airplane at high altitude. these lights were comparatively larger than a commercial passenger airline jet by at least ten times the size.   i know the lights were at high altitude because there were alto cirrus clouds in the sky that night and the lights went behind the clouds and never reappeared.  shortly after the lights went behind the clouds a commercial airplane jet was flying by in the northern sky and we could make the comparison.  the lights traveled in a straight line from northwest to southeast they gave an appearance as if they were traveling on a ladder, but without the ladder.   the lights were equally apart like the rungs of a ladder, however you would not know that there were all these lights until they came on one after the other in sequence.  one would come on then it would go off and then another would come on and then it would go off.   it was like they were taking steps but one behind the other, not side by side, each step would be on and off,
content.summary: While driving at night i saw a series of lights go on and off in sequence in a straight line.

content.detailedDescription:
At amnicon state park in wisconsin with my brother and nieces. they were climbing around on the rocks in the river and i was on a small walking bridge taking photos with my phone and as i was taking a pic this golden ball of light zoomed by right in front of my face, arching from the left and then downward. i saw it in my peripheral vision coming from my right side above my head and went right in front of my phone as i snapped a pic! i'm very sensitive and intuitive and i felt it had a playful energy about it. there was a woman with a baby in a stroller right behind me but may have been facing the opposite direction as they did not seem to notice it. i was pleasantly surprised when i was looking at my photos that i actually caught it in then picture! this took place a while back so can't really remember year/date etc. i've been very curious as to what it is but didn't really know who to send it too.
 
i also saw a green orb a few years later on our country property sometime in the fall/winter. it looked as though it just floated along slowly went through trees without maneuvering it's path much. it was the size of a large grapefruit maybe? wasn't able to get my phone quick enough to take photo/video.

not long after that a friend of mine said she witnessed the same sort of thing on her way home from my house. same size or bigger and seemed to just follow the tree line.
content.summary: Golden orb sphere about the size of a grapefruit flew right in front of me and i caught a pic unknowingly until later!

content.detailedDescription: There was 4 of us that saw the first one. tonight, there was lights moving very slowly. i, never ours. my wife is mad that i'm contacting you.....We need help! i tried to record but i couldn't get it on my phone. help!
content.summary: Twice we have seen this

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside of my apartment just before 9 am attempting to spot any of the persieds meteors. i wasn't expecting to see much and was holding my son rocking him to sleep. my son fell asleep in my arms after several minutes and i had not seen anything yet. i decided to wait a few more minutes in a ditch effort to hopefully see at least one meteor before the night was over, as i had seen one roughly 3 nights before.

as i was looking up in the sky in the north, northeast direction, and i suddenly noticed something moving that was very vague in appearance. it was almost directly overhead slightly towards the east when i spotted it. i blinked a few times and thought it was just the floaters in the eye(myodesopsia). after blinking a few times, i realized this object was actually solid, but very dark and almost transparent in appearance, with no discernible shape. it was only slightly lighter in color than the night sky, and seemed to be moving very fast. i couldn't tell if it was a bird flying relatively low, or an airplane at a very high altitude. a few things caught me off guard and led me to dismiss both possibilities. if it were a bird that was hard to see, it was moving too fast and seemed to travel miles within a matter of seconds. if it were an airplane, there would have been blinking lights and some noise. neither of these characteristics applied to this object.

i observed the object travel north, northeast towards corpus christi, tx for approximately 30 seconds. it traveled in this consistent trajectory at a high rate of speed. just as the object began to travel out of sight, i paced quickly towards the side of my apartment, with my son still in my arms, and attempted to track the object. the object suddenly blinked with a bright yellow-orange light, similar to a stars shine. the object then disappeared and i last saw it in the far northeast, about 20-30 degrees above the horizon.

i haven't seen any object like this before and was truly baffled as to what i had observed. i knew that i couldn't immediately explain it away as being birds, an airplane or the meteors i sought to actually see. i was even more confused by the last moments of this sighting, as it blinked brightly once. i felt as if it knew i was watching in amazement and confusion and "winked" at me just before it disappeared.
content.summary: Fast object traveling north, solid yet translucent appearance, no sound and 1 blink of light.

content.detailedDescription:
1. at my apartment and something gave me an idea and look up.

2.That it looked odd in the sky.

3. at first i figured it was a jet.

4. its actions seemed like it wasn't flying in our orbit. it was very high up, and i used the star for reference of position in the video. no flashing lights...No sound...When i zoomed in there were details i couldn't recognize.

5.Feelings were i am witnessing my first ufo encounter. i know about ce-5 and steven greer's work...

6. it flew out of sight in a way.
content.summary: I went outside and in the sky beyond where planes fly there was this solid single light with no sound flying over. i took this video from my cell phone. when i zoomed in there were more details to it. is this from ce-5 meditation?

content.detailedDescription: Standing on my front porch which faces directly west & was watching the air traffic coming & going from o hare field when i observed a bright orange/yellow orb/ craft as it got closer it seemed to slow down & hover for about 1 minute. that's when i went out into the street to try and get a better look. so i had my wife watch it while i ran into the house to get my phone & took a picture of it, not a great pic but you can still see it. as i was going to take another pic it seemed to reverse direction & became smaller & smaller until it disappeared from our view. thanks for reading this.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Viewed from my front porch a glowing disc/orb in the western sky coming from the direction of ohare field

content.detailedDescription:
Ufo reports
in 22.1.2015 at 13 pm in order to water my vases i went to the roof of the building when a white flying object in the southwest of the town with an altitude of about one km above and a distance of about the same caught my attention.
staring at the flying object i was in doubt whether it is a balloon or plane or at least a flying toy of a child playing near around. as it is got closer i saw a light shining at the top of it like the reflection of the sunlight from the surface of a metal. but what was strange is that the object was rotating or it is better to say that it was tumbling while getting closer and closer.
it wasn’t in a standard shape with a whole body in total white. i found out that it wasn’t an ordinary flying object. after 20 seconds it had an altitude of almost 1 km and a distance of about 100 or 200 m from my standing position, when it realized my existence. due to my bad luck it changed its direction to south east and slowly gained altitude to reach the top. in my estimation in the nearest point within me reach the object had the diameter of a ball.
i came down to come up with a camera so quickly. when i returned it had reached an altitude of about 3 km at that direction. it started to circle around with three sudden jumps, then the object went up and up and got disappeared in the clouds. each time the wind moved the clouds i took a photo from the unveiled flying object. meanwhile i got aware of a second flying object with an altitude higher than the previous one in a stationary state. that wasn’t clear enough to be watched. after about 4 min they gained altitude again and moved toward northeast along the clouds. 1 hour later it was almost impossible to sight them clearly.
one day later in 23.1 at about 11.30 i went to the roof once again with a camera. after 5 minutes of searching the sky, surprisingly a white shining object took my attention at my left side. it was moving from northeast to northwest with a high speed in a straight line with an altitude of 200 m in a distance of about 400 – 500 m. while i was turning my camera on (after 5 second) it completely stopped and just in one second i saw the object above the mountain like a bolt out of blue. it means that just in 1 second the object has made an unbelievable jump 1 km above the mountain or i have a made an optical illusion.
at that moment i doubt deeply of my observation, if i hadn’t took a photo a day before i eat several narcotic tablets with three day of staying in bed talking to nobody. anyway after the jumps the object stopped for seconds while it was suspending. then it started to circle around upward like a day before and jumped for several times to be leveled with the clouds. i got shocked. i was totally confused. i turned the camera on but before i could zoom on, it gradually paled and disappeared completely.
for the third time in 27.3.2015 around 11 or 12 pm, i was about to see another case moving again from the southwest to the northwest with a high speed. but it wasn’t recognizable anymore and passed above our house in a completely strange and unpredictable line from those of which observed a day before. the point is that a white translucent light was at the top of the object. in addition its motion in a crinkle way accompanied with increasing in altitude, periodically.
end. 

location :iran,shahrekord, tahlijan
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo jumping in sky

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were sitting outside and looking north towards balsam lake from the south say a very bright orange light to the northwest. it was a clear night, no wind, could see the big dipper and small dipper. object seem to be stationary but came closer after a few minutes and was moving very fast to the southeast. when it was overhead it was flickering like there was a short in the electrical system. cant describe any more then that.But after passing it stayed an orange light. to me aircraft do not have lights in the rear and not orange. moved in a straight line, faster then a jet and no noise.
content.summary: Orange light moving very fast ball shaped

content.detailedDescription: I observe these objects (lights) almost every night when the sky is clear; last night was the first time this object moved with intention and was lite up like a christmas tree. it's like it knows when i come outside and observe it that it dims it's lights; but last night i saw it travel across the sky; and no it was not a plane. there are red single lights in the sky all the time, i have observed them for several years now.......... but last night was the first i observed this object and no i can't identify the shape, can only tell that is it an object with white lights and a few red and green lights. can't say the shape of the object, just two side of an object with lights.
content.summary: Object with @ 10 lights a few red and green hovered and then went across the sky from west to east

content.detailedDescription: Upon returning home early from a friend's house on new years i was walking up my street when i noticed a fireball silently hovering in the sky at an undecipherable altitude.  the base sphere was about the size of the tip of a pen-cap and had approximately 5-7 tall tongues of flame, roughly twice the hight of the sphere below it wavering rapidly.  my immediate reaction was to assume that i was about to witness a plane-crash, but as i observed, the object hovered rather than falling.  i stood watching, trying to decide what it might be, but anything on fire like that would obviously crash, so the only remaining possibility was a ufo.  after a minute or two the object very slowly began moving east.  i pursued on foot.  despite its apparent crawling pace, the object quickly moved off into the distance, making me believe that it must have been at a very high altitude.
content.summary: Witnessed fireball with tall tongues of flame hovering for approximately 1-2 minutes.  object then slowly began to travel east.  i gave chase as on foot as the object disappeared into distance.

content.detailedDescription: In front of my house.Thought it was a satelite.It was lit up  fast sharp motions..It was a good feeling to watch it.Watched it for three hours got tired went to bed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright  fast  sounds like static electricity or a sparkler

content.detailedDescription:
I was baking cupcakes with my daughter, when my son yelled out to me to go to his room. he told me of some strange lights he just seen out of his window. he showed me the direction it went, so we go outside and rushed to see. sure enough i couldn't believe my eyes there it was moving and hoovering in the distance. it was triangle shape with a circle in the middle of it. it would change colors from red to green and yellow. i told my son to get my phone so i can record the event. what caught my eye was the way it was moving and i heard no sound from it.
well here's the video of the event i hope you can make something of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Strange lights outside so i went to check and sure enough i seen something i've never seen before.

content.detailedDescription: Driving east bound, saw two lights when far away. as we approached it turned into three lights and changed colors multiple times and the triangle changed direction multiple times. we turned towards it to get closer, and it instantly started to fly away at a very fast and consistent speed, it was stationary and then it was going the consistent speed, no getting up to speed just straight to that speed. second time i have saw a triangular craft in this area, except the first was about a year ago.
content.summary: Drove east bound, saw two lights which turned into a triangle then flew away as soon as we got close

content.detailedDescription: In 1960 i decided to join the army in cuba i was enthusiast with the revolution and to consider you fit you had to climb 3 times the turquino peak 6002 meter above sea level. in the 2nd journey to the peak at 5:20 am we observed downward because we where at least 4000 mmeter high, a couple of very bright lights a dozen or so that where maneuvering down in a valley toward the coastline, at first some of my companions said that it was probably some secret weapon brought from the ussr. but i knew that what those lights were doing, defys all phisical laws that i knew. they were ascending and descending each one of them by themselves, there was no unity, they look like bees landing on flowers, but at a speed that left no doubt it wasnt human made machines. there where around 800 witness that saw all that. after 20 min. checked by watch they disappeared just as they made their appearance. it was a great experience in my life. i am now 70 years old and still have this memory as fresh as that day.  later on i realize what a jerk i was joining this army that has cause so much suffering to my people. i was wise enough to escape from that atrocity in my twentys. thank you
content.summary: Round very bright light. at the distance that i observed them probably 3 or 4 ft in diameter
